item.description:
Hi Everyone,
Wednesday night means trivia! Come join us as we, in teams of six, show off our wide assortment of useless knowledge. Recent questions have included fileds such as sports, geography, science, literature, music, and movies.
Trivia night is a very laid back affair complete with an excellent bar and great Mexican food. It's a fun way to socialize with locals and meet new friends, so what are you waiting for? Sign up now to guarantee a spot at Newport's fastest growing meetup.
See you there,
Adam
item.how_to_find_us: Meet Adam in the bar. He can be reached at 401-699-7304.
item.name: Margaritas and Minds on Wednesday
